summary: The module demonstrates how to set up and run a text classification training pipeline with checkpointing support using the Accelerate library. It loads a dataset, tokenizes the text, creates training and evaluation dataloaders, configures a model, optimizer, and learning‑rate scheduler, and orchestrates training and evaluation while handling distributed environments and saving/restoring checkpoints.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑run example that helps developers understand and adopt Accelerate’s checkpointing capabilities for robust, reproducible model training in production or research settings.
